Features: Operative L-shaped desk with an 18mm thick wooden top in laminate finish and PVC lipping.
Based on metal structure with one rectangular metal leg and a metal inlay formed from 1.Smm metal sheets, electrostatic powder coated paint.
Includes attached side with 3 lockable drawers and cabinet with lockable lid.
Features concealed cable management system with aluminum flap.
Optional front modesty panel available in laminate finish.
Excludes electric source and grommet power outlet.
Can be matched with corresponding pedestal, credenza, and coffee table.

Dimensions: Standard Dimensions: LxWxH 150x170x75 CM (Right or Left side)
Standard Dimensions: LxWxH 170x170x75 CM (Right or Left side)
Standard Dimensions: LxWxH 190x170x75 CM (Right or Left side)

Features: Operative rectangular desk with 18mm thick wooden top in laminate finish with PVC lipping
Based on metal structure and two rectangular metal legs
Metal inlays formed from 1.Smm metal sheets in electrostatic powder coated paint
Includes concealed cable management system with aluminum flap
Available with front modesty panel in laminate finish (Optional)
Excluding electric source and grommet power outlet
Can be matched with corresponding pedestal; credenza and coffee table
